articles.title: Markets Tumble as Tariff Tensions Escalate
articles.description: U.S. stock futures dropped significantly following the Trump administration's tariff announcement. Experts attribute the decline to investor uncertainty and fears of a deepening trade war, potential recession, and lack of intervention by the Federal Reserve. Market recovery remains uncertain amid ongoing risk aversion.
